articles.content:

articles.title: Jio To Embed E-Commerce App Into WhatsApp Within 6 Months: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Mukesh Ambani's Reliance Industries plans to embed its ecommerce app JioMart into WhatsApp within six months, Mint reported on Monday, as the conglomerate looks to ramp up its retail and grocery business in the country.
articles.content:
At last count, WhatsApp had about 400 million users in India. (Representational)

articles.title: End Red Tape, Roll Out Red Carpet - Swarajya
articles.description: In the post-pandemic world, being the fastest growing economy is an imminently attainable target for India.
